about_the_game:
Goblin Quest II is the Prequel to Goblin Quest.

Goblin Quest II is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline.

Explore the once-familiar region of “The Great Forest,” lands filled with warring chiefs and old magic.

The new region is open, meaning you can walk through a changing world outside of cities, forts, and strongholds.

Goblin Quest II also adds a morning-to-night cycle, weather system, Days of the Months, and seasons into the game. These changes affect the world around you and other in-game systems, such as the economy.

All these changes allow you to play the story your way, with player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After finding yourself a captive of the goblin chieftain, you kill him, becoming the first human ruler in the Great Forest and enemies with the Warmaster, the ruler of the entire Great Forest. This is where you start building your story.

From playing the hero who saves the lands, the villain who doesn’t, and everything in the middle, you play how you wish.

Delve into Strongholds, fight against wildlife, or wage war throughout The Great Forest.

All while discovering supporters who can aid you in multiple ways. Such as becoming a Chief, Right Hand, or bodyguard.

Purchase homes and shops to earn passive income while traveling.

Upgrade your weapons, armor, and homes you unlock as you play the game.

Who will you save, enlist, or discover as you traverse the lands?

The world will adapt and respond to your actions.

You decide your fate.
